Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: room_viewer
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: bgrana
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: A simple widget for watching all participants of a room given.

InputEndpoint.name: join_room
InputEndpoint.label: New participant
InputEndpoint.description: Send participant username and room name.

OutputEndpoint.name: participant
OutputEndpoint.label: Participant join or leave room
OutputEndpoint.description: A participant join or leave a room.

OutputEndpoint.name: video_url
OutputEndpoint.label: Send video URL to room
OutputEndpoint.description: Send video URL to chat room widget.
